channel.title: A List Of Things I Need Help With
channel.description:
I am currently working on a Private server and Client. I am starting With the Server Things I Need.
SERVER: 1. I would like to add ess mining but im not sure how i would make it give you ess. i Would like you to get ess every 1.5-2 seconds 2. I would like to add rune crafting were you click on a alter and it gives you the right amount or runes for ess you have (not using ess on alter just clicking alter). 3. I would like Working Rc Pouches 4. I would like to know how to add complete Wc (normal logs, Willows, maples, yews, and magics. NO OAK PLEASE) 5. I would like to know how to add fletching (like you use a knife on maple logs, and it gives you the menu to choose). I got the Arrows working
CLIENT: 1. I would like to Know if it is possible to add commands client side, and if so how??? 2. 3. 4.
Please don't spam or post anything that's not an answer
And Can Any One Post a List Of Interface Id's.

item.title: A List Of Things I Need Help With
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Hi.

Server:

  1. addItem(ItemId,Quantity) And maybe make an esstimer, when the ess timer gets to 0, make it add the item.
  2. Case: AlterID
    if(skillblashit = skill#youwant)
    additem(ItemID,Quantity) etc…
  3. If(hasItem((itemId))…Forgot variable, plus it’s different in most sources, You get the idea.
  4. Case: TreeID
    addItem whatever
    setAnimation…
    ^That’s just the base.
  5. Item used method, w/ the interface.

Client:

  1. Some.

Fuck me.

Read full topic
item.source: A List Of Things I Need Help With

item.title: A List Of Things I Need Help With
item.dc:creator: @Hackerz Hackerz
item.description:
@Hackerz wrote:

I am currently working on a Private server and Client. I am starting With the Server Things I Need.

SERVER:

  1. I would like to add ess mining but im not sure how i would make it give you ess. i Would like you to get ess every 1.5-2 seconds
  2. I would like to add rune crafting were you click on a alter and it gives you the right amount or runes for ess you have (not using ess on alter just clicking alter).
  3. I would like Working Rc Pouches
  4. I would like to know how to add complete Wc (normal logs, Willows, maples, yews, and magics. NO OAK PLEASE)
  5. I would like to know how to add fletching (like you use a knife on maple logs, and it gives you the menu to choose). I got the Arrows working

CLIENT:

  1. I would like to Know if it is possible to add commands client side, and if so how???

Please don’t spam or post anything that’s not an answer

And Can Any One Post a List Of Interface Id’s.
